name: Emote Search
summary:
Emote Search is the version for streamers inspired by the popular "word search" games, made to enjoy with your audience. All you need is the chat to send the answers.

Engage with your viewers and play cooperatively to beat levels. It's easy to set up, and you pay nothing for it - the best option to add more fun and engagement to your live streams.

videos.name: Launch Trailer
videos.title: EMOTE SEARCH | The best game to play with your chat on stream
